CA_LDVR.name: Le Devoir
CA_LDVR.about: Le Devoir est un journal quotidien indépendant basé au Québec. Il se consacre à fournir les actualités les plus récentes et pertinentes, couvrant une gamme diversifiée de sujets allant de la politique locale et internationale à la culture, l'éducation et bien plus encore. Le Devoir est reconnu pour son journalisme d'investigation approfondi et son engagement envers l'intégrité et la transparence.

CA_QCTO.name: The Quebec Chronicle Telegraph
CA_QCTO.about: The Quebec Chronicle-Telegraph, distinguished as the oldest newspaper in North America, continues to be an authoritative source of news and information. Covering a broad array of topics, from politics, business, and culture to local events and lifestyle, it provides the Quebec community and beyond with valuable insights and engaging stories.

CA_TRTS.name: Toronto Star
CA_TRTS.about: The Toronto Star, one of Canada's leading news platforms, consistently delivers insightful and relevant news to a global audience. With coverage that spans local events, national affairs, and international stories, it remains dedicated to upholding journalistic integrity while informing and engaging its readers.

CA_TGAM.name: The Globe And Mail
CA_TGAM.about: The Globe And Mail, Canada's foremost news media company, continuously engages Canadians with comprehensive coverage on news, politics, business, investing, and lifestyle topics. Known for its in-depth analysis and high journalistic standards, it is an authoritative source for national and international news.

CA_LPRS.name: La Presse
CA_LPRS.about: La Presse se dédie à la production d'information de qualité, accessible gratuitement à un large public. Comme l'un des journaux les plus influents au Canada, elle offre une variété de contenus couvrant l'actualité locale et mondiale, la politique, les arts, les sports et bien plus encore. Elle reste engagée envers l'intégrité journalistique, la rigueur éditoriale et l'innovation technologique.

CA_JMTL.name: Le Journal de Montréal
CA_JMTL.about: Le Journal de Montréal est une publication de premier plan offrant des nouvelles complètes et accessibles dans divers domaines. Qu'il s'agisse de sports, de politique, de spectacles, de finance ou de judiciaire, ce journal assure une couverture approfondie pour garder son lectorat bien informé. L'accent est mis sur la présentation de l'information de manière claire et concise, ce qui le rend populaire parmi un large éventail de lecteurs.

CA_MTGZ.name: Montreal Gazette
CA_MTGZ.about: The Montreal Gazette is a trusted source for both national and international news. Committed to delivering accurate, insightful, and up-to-date reporting, the newspaper covers a broad range of topics from breaking news, events, to in-depth features. As one of the oldest newspapers in Canada, the Montreal Gazette continues to keep its readers informed about important happenings both locally and globally.

CA_VSUN.name: Vancouver Sun
CA_VSUN.about: Vancouver Sun brings the latest national and international news right at your fingertips. Offering comprehensive coverage on a variety of topics, including politics, business, entertainment, sports, and more, it ensures that its readers are always updated with events and happenings from around the globe.

CA_TPRV.name: The Province
CA_TPRV.about: The Province is committed to bringing the latest breaking news, updates, and headlines from national and international events. Covering diverse topics such as politics, sports, entertainment, and business, it ensures that its readers are always informed and engaged.

CA_NPST.name: National Post
CA_NPST.about: The National Post is a Canadian English-language newspaper that caters to a nationwide readership. Known for its fresh take on news, it covers national and international events, politics, sports, business, health, technology, and culture. The National Post has established itself as a leading voice in Canadian journalism, providing its readers with thought-provoking insights and comprehensive reportage.

CA_CLHD.name: Calgary Herald
CA_CLHD.about: Read latest breaking news, updates, and headlines on national and international events & more.

CA_OTCZ.name: Ottawa Citizen
CA_OTCZ.about: Read latest breaking news, updates, and headlines on national and international events & more.

CA_EDJL.name: Edmonton Journal
CA_EDJL.about: Read latest breaking news, updates, and headlines on national and international events & more.

CA_TSUN.name: Toronto Sun
CA_TSUN.about: Read latest breaking news, updates, and headlines on national and international events & more.

CA_LSOL.name: Le Soleil
CA_LSOL.about: Actualités, Chroniques, Affaires, Arts, Le Mag, Sports, Hockey junior, Opinions, Protégez-Vous, Nos recommandations, Jeunesse, Maison, Auto, Balados, ULaval Nouvelles, La Vitrine, ZONE, Je m'abonne, Événements Le Soleil.

CA_SPEC.name: The Hamilton Spectator
CA_SPEC.about: Daily breaking news, local stories, life, opinion, voices from the community, events and more.

CA_TCOL.name: The Times Colonist
CA_TCOL.about: Chronicled the history of Victoria and Vancouver Island from the gold rush days of the 1850s to Victoria's present status. Lively blend of local news and informed commentary.

CA_LFRP.name: The London Free Press
CA_LFRP.about: Read latest breaking news, updates, and headlines on national and international events & more.

CA_WNST.name: Windsor Star
CA_WNST.about: Read latest breaking news, updates, and headlines on national and international events & more.

CA_EDSN.name: Edmonton Sun
CA_EDSN.about: Read latest breaking news, updates, and headlines on national and international events & more.

CA_TREC.name: Waterloo Region Record
CA_TREC.about: Daily breaking news, local stories, life, opinion, voices from the community, events and more.

CA_SPHX.name: The StarPhoenix
CA_SPHX.about: Read latest breaking news, updates, and headlines on national and international events & more.

CA_CSUN.name: Calgary Sun
CA_CSUN.about: Read latest breaking news, updates, and headlines on national and international events & more.

CA_RLPT.name: Regina Leader-Post
CA_RLPT.about: Read latest breaking news, updates, and headlines on national and international events & more.

CA_LCDS.name: Le Courrier du Sud
CA_LCDS.about: Le Courrier du Sud, appartenant à Gravité Media, est un journal hebdomadaire distribué gratuitement. Il offre une couverture complète de l'actualité locale et régionale dans la région de Longueuil, notamment les nouvelles de la communauté, la politique, les événements culturels, les sports et plus encore.

CA_NIND.name: CanIndia News
CA_NIND.about: CanIndia News provides a unique perspective, representing the viewpoint of the South Asian community in Canada. It covers a broad range of topics including current events, business, sports, and entertainment, with a special focus on issues and stories relevant to the South Asian diaspora. Through its insightful coverage, CanIndia News serves as a crucial link connecting the South Asian community with wider Canadian society.

CA_TCJN.name: The Canadian Jewish News
CA_TCJN.about: Producing content that matters to the diverse community of Jews in Canada, through articles, podcasts and events.

CA_HRZN.name: Horizon Weekly
CA_HRZN.about: The official publication of Canada's Armenian Revolutionary Federation (ARF) Central Committee.

CA_KRTM.name: The Korea Times Daily
CA_KRTM.about: The first and longest-running Korean language daily newspaper in Canada.

CA_BJST.name: Bejsment
CA_BJST.about: Bejsment to cyfrowa platforma Wiadomości, wybitnej polskiej gazety wydawanej w Ontario, w Kanadzie. Dzięki silnej obecności w Internecie, pomaga ona diaspory polskiej w Kanadzie pozostać w kontakcie ze swoimi korzeniami i informować o swoim nowym domu. Bejsment pokrywa szeroki zakres tematów, od wiadomości i wydarzeń w polskiej społeczności, po aktualności z Polski i sprawy międzynarodowe.

CA_SLMT.name: Salam Toronto
CA_SLMT.about: The first Persian-English bilingual weekly publication in Canada.

CA_BNGT.name: Bengali Times
CA_BNGT.about: The first and most popular Bengali online newspaper in Canada.

CA_TCST.name: The Coast
CA_TCST.about: The Coast is essential media for Kjipuktuk/Halifax.

CA_STRT.name: The Georgia Straight
CA_STRT.about: No other city publication knows more about Vancouver than the Georgia Straight.

CA_GRPV.name: The Grapevine
CA_GRPV.about: The Grapevine is a community-driven arts and culture publisher serving the Annapolis Valley.

CA_NWMG.name: NOW Magazine
CA_NWMG.about: Toronto street magazine for alternative news, entertainment, events, and food.

CA_SALA.name: Salam Toronto
CA_SALA.about: The first Farsi-English bilingual weekly publications based in the Greater Toronto Area.

CA_ACNV.name: Acadie Nouvelle
CA_ACNV.about: L'actualité provinciale, régionale, sportive, économique et culturelle du Nouveau-Brunswick.

CA_BRUN.name: The Brunswickan
CA_BRUN.about: The official student newspaper of the Fredericton campus of the University of New Brunswick.

CA_LEMA.name: Le Moniteur Acadien
CA_LEMA.about: Un journal francophone originaire de Shediac, Nouveau-Brunswick offrant des nouvelles pertinentes aux peuples acadiens.

CA_LEFR.name: Le Franco
CA_LEFR.about: Le seul média francophone consacré à l'actualité albertaine au Canada.

CA_BRTY.name: Barrie Today
CA_BRTY.about: Barrie news, events, information and more.  Local news from local journalists, photos, event coverage, weekly flyers, entertainment.

CA_BAYT.name: Bay Today
CA_BAYT.about: North Bay, nipissing, news, editorials, events, calendar, maps, businesses, directory, weather, sports, classified ads, accommodations, apartments, real estate, coupons, northern Ontario, Canada, Algoma, entertainment.

CA_BRAD.name: Bradford Today
CA_BRAD.about: Regularly updated local news from local journalists along with photos, video, sports, events, classifieds, weekly flyers, entertainment.

CA_BRLT.name: Burlington Today
CA_BRLT.about: Burlington's newest source for local news, sports, business community information, obituaries and more.

CA_CMBT.name: Cambridge Today
CA_CMBT.about: News, events, weather, obituaries and more - all focused on Cambridge.

CA_COLT.name: Collingwood Today
CA_COLT.about: Collingwood's online source for local news, obituaries, events and more.

CA_ELKT.name: Elliot Lake Today
CA_ELKT.about: Elliot Lake News, Weather, Obituaries and more.  Elliot Lake's online source for community information, updated regularly.

CA_ELFT.name: Elora & Fergus Today
CA_ELFT.about: EloraFergusToday is your go-to source for local news in  the Elora and Fergus communities, offering the latest updates on the events, issues, people and businesses that matter most.

CA_GUET.name: Guelph Today
CA_GUET.about: Guelph news, events, information and more.  Local news from local journalists, photos, event coverage, weekly flyers and entertainment.

CA_HHLT.name: Halton Hills Today
CA_HHLT.about: HaltonHillsToday is your go-to source for local news in Halton Hills, offering the latest updates on the events, issues, people and businesses that matter most in our community.

CA_INFT.name: Innisfil Today
CA_INFT.about: News, events, weather, obituaries and more - all focused on Innisfil.

CA_MDLT.name: Midland Today
CA_MDLT.about: Midland's source for local news and community information.  Includes original reporting, sports, entertainment, obituaries, weather, and more.

CA_NRKT.name: Newmarket Today
CA_NRKT.about: Newmarket's online news source, including local news from local journalists, photos, video, sports, events, classifieds, weekly flyers, and entertainment.

CA_NOTL.name: Niagara-on-the-Lake Local
CA_NOTL.about: Niagara-on-the-Lake news, events, information and more.  Local news from local journalists, photos, event coverage, weekly flyers and entertainment.

CA_NROB.name: Northern Ontario Business
CA_NROB.about: Northern Ontario Business publication provides Northern Ontario with relevant, current, and insightful editorial content and business news and information.

CA_ORIL.name: Orillia Matters
CA_ORIL.about: Orillia's online news source.  Local news from local journalists, photos, video, sports, events, classifieds, weekly flyers and entertainment.

CA_PLHT.name: Pelham Today
CA_PLHT.about: Pelham's source for local news, sports, business community information, obituaries and more.

CA_SOTY.name: Soo Today
CA_SOTY.about: Sault Ste. Marie's largest news source. Local news from local journalists, photos, video, sports, events, classifieds, weekly flyers and entertainment.

CA_STRF.name: Stratford Today
CA_STRF.about: The news that matters most to the Stratford community, as it happens.

CA_SUDY.name: Sudbury.com
CA_SUDY.about: Sudbury's number one source for local news. Stay current with news, sports, entertainment, classifieds, events and more.

CA_THOR.name: Thorold Today
CA_THOR.about: Thorold's local news source.  Local news from local journalists, photos, video, sports, weekly flyers, entertainment and more.

CA_TIMM.name: Timmins Today
CA_TIMM.about: Timmins news, events, information and more.  Local news from local journalists, photos, event coverage, weekly flyers, entertainment.

CA_LONG.name: Longmont Leader
CA_LONG.about: Longmont's local news source. Local news from local journalists, photos, video, sports, entertainment and more.

CA_SOOL.name: Soo Leader
CA_SOOL.about: Soo Leader is your go-to source for local news in Sault Ste Marie, Michigan, offering the latest updates on the events, issues, people and businesses that matter most in our community.

CA_OBSV.name: The Sarnia Observer
CA_OBSV.about: A newspaper that covers the latest news, sports, entertainment and lifestyle stories from Sarnia-Lambton, Ontario.

CA_KNCD.name: Kincardine News
CA_KNCD.about: All the latest breaking Kincardine news, stories and updates affecting Kincardine today.

CA_CBC.name: CBC
CA_CBC.about: Canada's home for breaking and in-depth coverage of local, national and international news.

CA_GLBL.name: Global News
CA_GLBL.about: Global News provides breaking news & current latest Canadian news headlines; national weather forecasts & predictions, local news videos, money and financial news; sports stats and scores.

CA_CTVN.name: CTV News
CA_CTVN.about: CTV News is a national news organization delivering breaking news, in-depth analysis, and comprehensive coverage of events from Canada and around the world. It is one of the most-watched television news networks in the country.

CA_APTN.name: APTN National News
CA_APTN.about: APTN National News delivers daily Indigenous-focused journalism from across Canada. It is the first national Indigenous broadcaster in the world, dedicated to stories affecting First Nations, Inuit, and Métis communities.

CA_SALT.name: SaltWire Network
CA_SALT.about: SaltWire Network is Atlantic Canada's largest media group, publishing over 20 newspapers including the Halifax Chronicle Herald and The Guardian. It provides regional news coverage across Nova Scotia, Newfoundland and Labrador, and Prince Edward Island.

CA_NOBS.name: Canada's National Observer
CA_NOBS.about: The National Observer is an independent Canadian online news organization focused on climate change, energy, politics, and social justice. It provides investigative journalism and analysis with a progressive lens.

CA_WFP.name: Winnipeg Free Press
CA_WFP.about: The Winnipeg Free Press is Manitoba's largest and oldest newspaper, providing trusted local, national, and international news. Known for its editorial independence and strong regional coverage.

CA_THEW.name: The Walrus
CA_THEW.about: The Walrus is a Canadian magazine of ideas, committed to publishing long-form journalism on politics, science, culture, and current affairs. It is a charitable non-profit focused on deep reporting and public dialogue.

CA_TYEE.name: The Tyee
CA_TYEE.about: The Tyee is an independent, non-profit digital news magazine that covers Canadian politics, society, and culture with a focus on British Columbia. It is known for investigative reporting and progressive perspectives.

CA_TNC.name: True North
CA_TNC.about: True North is a digital media platform that provides news, opinion, and analysis on Canadian politics and culture from a conservative perspective. It is operated by the True North Centre for Public Policy.

CA_MCLN.name: Maclean's
CA_MCLN.about: Maclean's is Canada's national current affairs magazine, covering politics, culture, society, and public affairs. Known for its long-standing journalism, analysis, and rankings.

CA_LACT.name: L'actualité
CA_LACT.about: L'actualité is Quebec's leading French-language magazine, focused on in-depth analysis of politics, culture, science, and society. It is known for thoughtful journalism and investigative reporting.

CA_REBL.name: Rebel News
CA_REBL.about: Rebel News is a digital media outlet known for its conservative, populist coverage of politics and social issues. It focuses on issues from a right-leaning perspective and engages in activist journalism.

CA_NUNS.name: Nunatsiaq News
CA_NUNS.about: Nunatsiaq News is the leading newspaper serving Nunavut and Nunavik. It provides bilingual coverage of Indigenous news, politics, environment, and community stories from Canada's Arctic region.

CA_APOL.name: Abbotsford News
CA_APOL.about: Abbotsford News is a weekly community newspaper serving Abbotsford, British Columbia. It provides local coverage of events, politics, business, and culture in the Fraser Valley region.

CA_BPPG.name: Briarpatch Magazine
CA_BPPG.about: Briarpatch is a Canadian independent magazine of politics and grassroots activism, based in Saskatchewan. It focuses on social justice, Indigenous issues, and environmental justice.

CA_24MTL.name: 24 Heures
CA_24MTL.about: 24 Heures is a free French-language daily news site based in Montreal, focusing on local news, sports, entertainment, and lifestyle. It was formerly distributed as a print commuter paper.

CA_CHRH.name: The Chronicle Herald
CA_CHRH.about: The Chronicle Herald is the largest daily newspaper in Atlantic Canada, serving Halifax and the surrounding Nova Scotia region. It provides local news, opinion, business, and cultural coverage.

CA_GUAR.name: The Guardian (Charlottetown)
CA_GUAR.about: The Guardian is Prince Edward Island's leading daily newspaper, providing coverage of local news, politics, community events, and business in Charlottetown and across the province.

CA_CBPT.name: Cape Breton Post
CA_CBPT.about: The Cape Breton Post is the daily newspaper for Cape Breton Island, based in Sydney, Nova Scotia. It focuses on regional news, sports, culture, and community affairs.

CA_JPNS.name: Journal Pioneer
CA_JPNS.about: The Journal Pioneer is a weekly newspaper based in Summerside, PEI. It provides coverage of local news, sports, and community happenings across western Prince Edward Island.

CA_LDRT.name: Le Droit
CA_LDRT.about: Le Droit is a historic French-language daily newspaper serving the Ottawa-Gatineau region. It offers coverage of politics, culture, business, and local news on both sides of the Ontario-Quebec border.

CA_LTRB.name: La Tribune
CA_LTRB.about: La Tribune is a French-language daily newspaper based in Sherbrooke, Québec. It reports on local and regional issues in Estrie, including politics, health, and the economy.

CA_LNVL.name: Le Nouvelliste
CA_LNVL.about: Le Nouvelliste is the main daily newspaper serving Trois-Rivières and the Mauricie region. It delivers in-depth French-language coverage of local affairs, justice, and municipal politics.

CA_LQTD.name: Le Quotidien
CA_LQTD.about: Le Quotidien is a French-language daily based in Saguenay, Québec. It offers regional news coverage with a focus on local development, economy, and culture in the Saguenay–Lac-Saint-Jean area.

CA_WINDS.name: Windspeaker
CA_WINDS.about: Windspeaker is a national Indigenous news outlet providing coverage of issues affecting First Nations, Métis, and Inuit peoples across Canada. It is published by the Aboriginal Multi-Media Society (AMMSA).

CA_TISL.name: Turtle Island News
CA_TISL.about: Turtle Island News is Canada's only national Native weekly newspaper. Based on Six Nations of the Grand River, it reports on Indigenous politics, land defense, and community stories.

CA_MPAO.name: Ming Pao (Canada)
CA_MPAO.about: Ming Pao is a Chinese-language daily newspaper serving Chinese-speaking communities in Toronto and Vancouver. It provides news from Canada, Hong Kong, China, and global Chinese diaspora communities.

CA_STAO.name: Sing Tao Daily (Canada)
CA_STAO.about: Sing Tao Daily is a prominent Chinese-language newspaper in Canada, with editions in Toronto, Vancouver, and Calgary. It covers local Chinese-Canadian issues, international affairs, and business.

CA_UBYS.name: The Ubyssey
CA_UBYS.about: The Ubyssey is the official student newspaper of the University of British Columbia in Vancouver. It covers campus affairs, student issues, university policy, and local events.

CA_GAIT.name: The Gateway
CA_GAIT.about: The Gateway is the student-run newspaper of the University of Alberta. It provides news, opinion, and culture coverage relevant to students and the Edmonton community.

CA_VARC.name: The Varsity
CA_VARC.about: The Varsity is the official student newspaper of the University of Toronto. It publishes investigative news, student opinion, and cultural reporting from across all three U of T campuses.

CA_MGLT.name: The McGill Tribune
CA_MGLT.about: The McGill Tribune is one of McGill University's main student publications, covering news, opinion, sports, and arts. It is run entirely by students and is editorially independent from the university.

CA_BIVN.name: Business in Vancouver
CA_BIVN.about: Business in Vancouver provides news and analysis for British Columbia's business community, covering industries such as real estate, tech, law, and finance. It targets decision-makers and entrepreneurs.

CA_WIRE.name: The Wire Report
CA_WIRE.about: The Wire Report is Canada's leading source of news about telecommunications, media, and digital policy. It delivers coverage of regulatory decisions, legislation, and telecom mergers.

CA_TECH.name: IT World Canada
CA_TECH.about: IT World Canada is the country's leading technology-focused media brand. It covers enterprise IT, cybersecurity, cloud, and digital transformation for Canadian business professionals.

CA_CARTT.name: Cartt.ca
CA_CARTT.about: Cartt.ca provides news and analysis on Canada's cable, radio, television, and telecom sectors. It tracks industry changes, CRTC decisions, and executive movement across media companies.

CA_YUKN.name: Yukon News
CA_YUKN.about: Yukon News is the primary newspaper serving Whitehorse and surrounding Yukon communities. It offers news, opinion, and cultural reporting focused on life in the North.

CA_NWTP.name: News/North (NWT)
CA_NWTP.about: News/North is the major newspaper covering the Northwest Territories. It delivers weekly coverage of territorial politics, Indigenous issues, and community life across the NWT.

CA_SASK.name: SaskToday
CA_SASK.about: SaskToday is a digital news hub for Saskatchewan, aggregating local stories from a network of Prairie newspapers. It covers politics, farming, rural life, and community news.

CA_MBPT.name: Portage Online
CA_MBPT.about: Portage Online is a community-focused digital outlet for Portage la Prairie and central Manitoba. It features local news, events, weather, sports, and opinion.

CA_CULT.name: Cult MTL
CA_CULT.about: Cult MTL is an English-language arts, culture, and lifestyle publication based in Montreal. It covers music, film, food, events, and urban issues with a youthful, alternative perspective.

CA_STRS.name: Stir
CA_STRS.about: Stir is a digital platform dedicated to Canada's arts and culture scene, featuring stories about artists, performances, design, and creative innovation from across the country.
